messages.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
Your kindness is a gift that keeps giving.
Courage is not the absence of fear, but action in spite of it.
Today's struggle is tomorrow's strength.
A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Be the reason someone believes in the goodness of people.
What you seek is seeking you.
Stars can't shine without darkness.
Your potential is endless. Go do what you were created to do.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Small acts of kindness create ripples of change.
You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem.
Every expert was once a beginner.
Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
In a world where you can be anything, be kind.
Fortune favors the bold.
Growth is painful. Change is painful. But nothing is as painful as staying stuck.
Life is too important to be taken seriously.
Your only limit is your mind.
Happiness is found when you stop comparing yourself to others.
The universe is conspiring in your favor.
Be fearless in the pursuit of what sets your soul on fire.
You are allowed to be both a masterpiece and a work in progress.
The sun will rise and we will try again.
Your energy introduces you before you even speak.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
It's okay to not be okay, as long as you don't stay that way.
Throw kindness around like confetti.
The best view comes after the hardest climb.
You don't have to be perfect to be amazing.
Today is a good day to have a good day.
Your vibe attracts your tribe.
Be a voice, not an echo.
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
You are capable of more than you know.
Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
The comeback is always stronger than the setback.
Make today so awesome that yesterday gets jealous.
You are never too old to set another goal or dream a new dream.
Kindness is free. Sprinkle it everywhere.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
Take the risk or lose the chance.
Bloom where you are planted.
Good things come to those who hustle.
Let your faith be bigger than your fear.
The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
You are the author of your own story.
Dream big. Work hard. Stay humble.
